ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to thank L. Sushama and K. Winger [Centre pour l’étude et la simulation du climat à l’échelle régionale (ESCER), Université du Québec à Montréal (UQAM)], who provided the CRCM5 simulations. We also acknowledge the support of Compute Canada national HPC platform and the Calcul Québec regional HPC platform to run the CRCM5 model.
